Litter ruins our environment.

Make a difference and join the litter heroes clearing our streets, parks and beaches for the Great British Spring Clean.

urls.title: Great British Spring Clean | Keep Britain Tidy
urls.description: Our Great British Spring Clean has now finished for 2021. Thanks a Million to all the #Litt erHeroes who took part to make 1.15 Million miles of British outdoor spaces cleaner and greener. When we set off on our #MillionMileMission, we knew our goal was ambitious. And despite the challenges we have faced, our community of #LitterHeroes has shown the world environmental action at its best. Don‚Äôt forget to complete our short evaluation, to help us improve the campaign, and for your chance to win ¬£100 of

entity.name: SAS: Who Dares Wins
entity.description: A group of ex-Special Forces soldiers recreate the selection process for the SAS they themselves passed and put 30 civilian men through it.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins for Stand Up to Cancer
entity.description: In `Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins', twelve well-known public figures from the worlds of entertainment, sports and politics embark on the one of the toughest tests of their lives as they try to pass a unique version of the infamous SAS Selection test over a gruelling seven-day period, led by tough chief instructor Ant Middleton and his team of staff - Foxy, Billy, Ollie and Jay - who don't care how famous the recruits are, how many followers they have, or what they have done until now. As soon as they enter the selection process their celebrity status vanishes. Will the celebs have what it takes to make it through this unique version of SAS selection?
